public class LiaisonAdminToolMainGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The class is the frame for the main window of the liaison AdminGui.

1.0

LiaisonAdminToolMainGUI

public LiaisonAdminToolMainGUI(LiaisonAdminToolController app)
Creates new form LiaisonAdminToolMainGUI
Parameters:
app - Pointer to the LiaisonAdminToolController (application shell) for access to all public data structures.
Method Detail

loadNewAlpTree

public void loadNewAlpTree()
this routine assumes a new ALP tree has been brought in by the application, and that the AlpDisplayServer has modeling the necessary things. Now it updates the GUI to reflect all the newly loaded data.

validateAndUpdateExternalTree

public void validateAndUpdateExternalTree()
This method is used to update the current external tree to the GUI. This is the safer method that ensures the Liaison Set is consistent prior to updating.

loadNewExternalTree

public void loadNewExternalTree(ALPAgentReference alpRef)
This method updates the GUI to reflect a newly loaded external society. It does NOT check for validity first.

setPermissionsValues

public void setPermissionsValues(ALPAgentReference alpRef,
                                 ExternalAgentReference extRef)
Sets the values of the combo boxes for the permissions panels, whether or not they may be enabled.

updatePermissionsPanel

public void updatePermissionsPanel(ALPAgentReference alpRef,
                                   ExternalAgentReference extRef,
                                   boolean updateValues)
The high level driver method for having the permissions panel reset to display the proper settings, text, and values for the current ALPRef, ExtRef pair

repaintMainALPTree

public void repaintMainALPTree()
Forces the ALP Tree to repaint itself

repaintMainExtTree

public void repaintMainExtTree()
Forces the external tree to repaint itself.

setStatusBar

public void setStatusBar(java.lang.String newStatus)
Sets the text in the status bar

hideAlpTree

public void hideAlpTree()
Hides the ALP Tree and its window. Use when no ALP Society loaded.

showAlpTree

public void showAlpTree()
Makes ALP Tree Visible

hideExtTree

public void hideExtTree()
Hides the Ext Tree and its window. Use when no Ext Tree is loaded.

showExtTree

public void showExtTree()
Makes external Tree visible

setFirstAlpTree

public void setFirstAlpTree()
Force a selection of the first ALP Society in the Alp Society Combo Box
